pages.text: $(b)Rituals$() are powerful magical ceremonies. They require careful preparation and specific components.

pages.title: Drawing Circles
pages.text: $(l)Creating Ritual Circles:$()$(br2)1. Craft $(violet)Magic Chalk$()$(br)2. Draw a circle on the ground$(br)3. Place ritual components$(br)4. Activate with appropriate catalyst$(br2)$(violet)Precision is key!$()

pages.title: Barrier Circles
pages.text: $(b)Barrier Circles$() create protective zones. Use $(violet)Magic Chalk$() to draw the circle, then place:$(br2)• $(#)Barrier Catalyst$() in center$(br)• $(#)Distance Glyphs$() for range$(br)• $(#)Guardian Statues$() for power$(br2)See $(violet)Barrier System$() entry for details.

pages.title: Advanced Rituals
pages.text: $(l)Ritual Types:$()$(br2)$(b)Binding Spell$()$(br)Binds magic to locations$(br2)$(b)Kamikaze Ritual$()$(br)Powerful one-time effect$(br2)Explore the world to discover more ritual structures!
